fields.name: Parameters (finish)
fields.value:
`step2_file` - The step2 file obtained from `/item checkpoint`
`mining_speed` - Mining speed, integer input
`liquid_clipped` - Item clips in liquid?
`mirrored_art` - The item art is mirrored?
`projectile` - Projectile item component
`projectile_entity` - The entity to be fired, requires `projectile`
`projectile_min_crit_power` - Projectile minimum critical power, requires `projectile`
`dye_powder` - The color of the dye item
`throwable` - Throwable item component
`throwable_do_swing_animation` - Whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown, requires `throwable`
`throwable_max_draw_duration` - Maximum draw duration for the throwable item, decimal input
`throwable_scale_pow_by_draw_dura` - Whether or not to scale power by draw duration, requires `throwable`
`knockback_resistance` - Knockback resistance, integer input
`fuel_duration` - Cook duration for fuel items, decimal input
`record` - Record item component
